original_title:
Listen to how rabid the Democrats are for crime - yelling at Pete Hegseth, JD Vance and Stephen Miller.

"F*CK you, Pete! F*ck you, N@zi!"

"Get the F*CK, out, of, my, CITY!!"  — The Donald
article_summary: Democrats and Republicans engage in heated debates, with some Democrats using offensive language towards conservative figures. The discussion revolves around crime and the impact of anti-bullying policies, with differing opinions on their effectiveness. Some users suggest that the lack of discipline in children, such as spanking, could have prevented such behavior.</s>
